00007 // holds configuration parameter for StorageManager
00008 //
00009 
00010 #include <toolbox/net/Utils.h>
00011 #include <string>
00012 
00013 namespace stor 
00014 {
00015   class Parameter
00016     {
00017     public:
00018       Parameter() :
00019   fileCatalog_("summaryCatalog.txt"),
00020   smInstance_("0"),
00021   hostName_(toolbox::net::getHostName()),
00022   initialSafetyLevel_(0),
00023         fileName_("storageManager"),
00024         filePath_("/scratch2/cheung"),
00025         setupLabel_("mtcc"),
00026   maxFileSize_(-1),
00027         highWaterMark_(0.9),
00028         lumiSectionTimeOut_(45.0),
00029         exactFileSizeTest_(false)
00030       {
00031         // strip domainame
00032          std::string::size_type pos = hostName_.find('.');  
00033          if ( pos != std::string::npos ) {  
00034            std::string basename = hostName_.substr(0,pos);  
00035            hostName_ = basename;
00036          }
00037       }
00038 
00039       const std::string& fileCatalog()        const {return fileCatalog_;}
00040       const std::string& smInstance()         const {return smInstance_;}
00041       const std::string& host()               const {return hostName_;}
00042       const std::string& fileName()           const {return fileName_;}
00043       const std::string& filePath()           const {return filePath_;}
00044       const std::string& setupLabel()         const {return setupLabel_;}
00045       int    maxFileSize()             const {return maxFileSize_;} 
00046       double highWaterMark()           const {return highWaterMark_;}
00047       double lumiSectionTimeOut()      const {return lumiSectionTimeOut_;}
00048       bool exactFileSizeTest()         const {return exactFileSizeTest_;}
00049       int initialSafetyLevel()         const {return initialSafetyLevel_;}
00050 
00051       // not efficient to pass object but tolerable
00052       void setFileCatalog       (std::string x) {fileCatalog_=x;}
00053       void setSmInstance        (std::string x) {smInstance_=x;}
00054       void setfileName          (std::string x) {fileName_=x;}
00055       void setfilePath          (std::string x) {filePath_=x;}
00056       void setsetupLabel        (std::string x) {setupLabel_=x;}
00057       void setmaxFileSize               (int x) {maxFileSize_=x;}
00058       void sethighWaterMark          (double x) {highWaterMark_=x;}
00059       void setlumiSectionTimeOut     (double x) {lumiSectionTimeOut_=x;}
00060       void setExactFileSizeTest        (bool x) {exactFileSizeTest_=x;}
00061       void initialSafetyLevel   (int i)         {initialSafetyLevel_=i;}
00062 
00063    private:
00064       std::string fileCatalog_;
00065       std::string smInstance_;
00066       std::string hostName_;
00067       int         initialSafetyLevel_;
00068       std::string fileName_;
00069       std::string filePath_;
00070       std::string setupLabel_;
00071       int         maxFileSize_; 
00072       double      highWaterMark_;
00073       double      lumiSectionTimeOut_;
00074       bool        exactFileSizeTest_;
00075     }; 
00076 }
